title: doblezero
author: doblezero
content: Hello colleagues, I would like to know how much this newspaper could be worth.(The Times 3 January 2009 Chancellor on brink of second bailout for banks)I ask because a friend of mine is thinking of buying one, but I couldn't tell him what the estimated price would be, thanks.

comments.author: bitbollo
comments.body: You can start by having a look here: https://www.thetimes03jan2009.com/ (owner https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?action=profile;u=125867 Bittburger)It seems no one want sell a copy for less of 250K USD... Previously a copy has been sold for 7.4 btc (Mid-2020) https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5134423.0it seems it was a kind of exceptions and the copy was with some minor faults.

comments.author: doblezero
comments.body: Thank you very much for the information.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: This site may be of some help https://www.thetimes03jan2009.com/Got a feeling the website was created or maintained by a forum member - just canâ€™t remember who at the mo ?
